mapper.insert: INSERT INTO club SET regDate = NOW(), updateDate = NOW(), leaderId = #{loginedMemberId}, `name`= #{name}, areacode = #{areacode}, categoryId = #{categoryId}, purpose = #{purpose};
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, AVG(m.age) AS 'avgAge' FROM member_club mc INNER JOIN club c ON mc.clubId = c.id INNER JOIN `member` m ON mc.memberId = m.id GROUP BY c.id;
SELECT c.id AS 'id', COUNT(mc.memberId) AS 'membersCount' FROM club c INNER JOIN member_club mc ON c.id = mc.clubId GROUP BY c.id;

choose.when: SELECT areacode, step1 FROM region WHERE step2 = "" AND step3 = "" ORDER BY step1
SELECT areacode, step2 FROM region WHERE step1 = #{keyword} AND step3 = "" AND step2 != "" ORDER BY step2
SELECT areacode, step3 FROM region WHERE step2 = #{keyword} AND step3 != "" ORDER BY step3

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_club SET memberId = #{memberId}, clubId = #{clubId}, purpose = #{purpose}, regDate = NOW();
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, mc.memberId FROM club c INNER JOIN member_club mc ON c.id = mc.clubId WHERE memberId = #{memberId};
SELECT mc.*, m.name AS 'name' FROM `member` m INNER JOIN member_club mc ON m.id = mc.memberId WHERE mc.clubId = #{clubId};
